descriptions.app_description: Get ticket created on freshdesk at interval.

data.author: Amyy
key_features: Fetches notification for tickets created on freshdesk at intervals
This Integration requries your freshdesk domain and API key
Add this url (https://freshdesk-notifications-telex-integration.onrender.com/tick) to your freshdesk webhook to start receving notifications!
To test send a test email to support@nwabueze2amarachi.freshdesk.com or visit https://nwabueze2amarachi.freshdesk.com/support/tickets/new to create a new ticket and get notified in telex
